I like gardening.

participant_2.background:
I swim often.
I love video games.
I run track.
I take medication.

content.text: I'm so glad I met you, I love hearing about other people's hobbies.
Thanks, me too! It's always nice to meet someone who is passionate about something.
So tell me more about your love of video games.
Well, I've been playing video games since I was a kid. I love the challenge and the excitement. I also love the way they can transport me to another world.
That's what I love about them too! I can always find a game that fits my mood, whether I'm looking for something relaxing or something more challenging.
Exactly! And there are so many different types of games out there, so there's something for everyone.
So, what are some of your favorite video games?
I love the Legend of Zelda series, as well as the Final Fantasy series. I also really enjoy playing games like Red Dead Redemption and Grand Theft Auto.
Those are all great games! I've played a few of them myself.
Oh, that's awesome! What did you think of them?
I thought they were all really great games. I especially enjoyed the open world gameplay of Red Dead Redemption and Grand Theft Auto.
Me too! I love being able to explore the world and do whatever I want.
So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I love to play video games, watch movies, and hang out with my friends.
Those all sound like fun things to do! I like to do a lot of the same things.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
Yeah, we do! It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
